aria-describedby.description: Id to use for the modal box description.

aria-labelledby.description: Id to use for the modal box label.

children.description: Content rendered inside the modal box. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the modal box.

position.description: Position of the modal. By default a modal will be positioned vertically and horizontally centered.

positionOffset.description: Offset from alternate position. Can be any valid CSS length/percentage.
